summary.span: 提供 Microsoft Office Excel 的文档级项目中的 ThisWorkbook 类的基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for the ThisWorkbook class in document-level projects for Microsoft Office Excel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是通过使用 Visual Studio 创建的`ThisWorkbook`文档级 Excel 项目中的类的基类。 The class is the base class for the `ThisWorkbook` class in document-level Excel projects created by using Visual Studio. `ThisWorkbook`使用类以编程方式访问项目中的工作簿。Use the `ThisWorkbook` class to programmatically access the workbook in your project. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations)。For more information, see [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations). 该类提供与 Excel 主互操作程序集中的对象相同的成员, 但它添加了以下功能: The class provides the same members as the object in the Excel primary interop assembly, but it adds the following features: - 属性。 property. 使用此属性将智能标记添加到工作簿。Use this property to add smart tags to a workbook. - 属性。 property. 使用此属性可获取工作簿宿主项的基础对象。Use this property to get the underlying object for a workbook host item. - 方法。 method. 使用此方法可以从文档级自定义项中的工作簿中删除 Office 自定义程序集。Use this method to remove the Office customization assembly from the workbook in a document-level customization. - 方法。 method. 如果使用 "**功能区 (可视化设计器)** " 项模板将多个自定义功能区添加到项目中, 并且想要指定要在运行时显示的功能区, 请重写此方法。Override this method if you added multiple custom Ribbons to your project by using the **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item template, and you want to specify which Ribbons to display at run time. - 方法。 method. 重写此方法可向工作簿中的 VBA 代码公开项目中的类。Override this method to expose a class in your project to VBA code in the workbook. ## 创建工作簿宿主项Creating Workbook Host Items 不能在 Office 项目中以编程方式创建对象。You cannot create objects programmatically in Office projects. 在文档级项目中, `ThisWorkbook` [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]当最终用户打开工作簿时, 类 (派生自) 会自动实例化。In document-level projects, the `ThisWorkbook` class (which derives from ) is instantiated automatically by the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] when the end user opens the workbook. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations)。For more information, see [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations). 在应用程序级项目中, 您可以使用`GetVstoObject`方法以编程方式创建工作簿宿主项。In application-level projects, you can create workbook host items programmatically by using the `GetVstoObject` method. 有关更多信息，请参见 [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time)。For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time). ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net4utilities](~/includes/vsto-net4utilities-md.md)] ## Examples [主机项和主机控件概述Host Items and Host Controls Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/host-items-and-host-controls-overview) [工作簿主机项Workbook Host Item](/visualstudio/vsto/workbook-host-item)

param.name: when

param.span: 一个标识进行要接受的更改的人的字符串。

summary.span: 接受共享工作簿中的所有更改。

span.span: Accepts all changes in the shared workbook.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 有关可选参数的信息, 请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions).

summary.span: 指定特定工作表函数是否使用最新精度算法来计算其结果。

span.span: Specifies whether certain worksheet functions use the latest accuracy algorithms to calculate their results.

value.span: 一个指定特定工作表函数是否使用最新精度算法来计算其结果的值。

span.span: A value that specifies whether certain worksheet functions use the latest accuracy algorithms to calculate their results.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下, Excel 2007 和更早版本的 Excel 中的某些工作表函数使用的新算法会提高其准确性。By default, some of the worksheet functions from Excel 2007 and earlier versions of Excel use new algorithms that increase their accuracy. 但是, 在某些情况下, 新算法相对于其在 Excel 2007 和早期版本的 Excel 中的性能降低了这些函数的性能。However, in some cases, the new algorithms decrease the performance of these functions relative to their performance in Excel 2007 and earlier versions of Excel. 若要指定这些工作表函数使用较旧的算法以提高其性能, 请将属性设置为1。To specify that these worksheet functions use the older algorithms to increase their performance, set the property to 1. 下表描述了属性可能的设置。The following table describes the possible settings for the property. |设置Setting|说明Description| |-------------|-----------------| |00|使用最新、最准确的算法 (默认值)Use the latest, most accurate algorithms (default)| |11|使用 Excel 2007 或更早版本的算法Use Excel 2007 or earlier version algorithms| |22|使用 Excel 2010 算法Use Excel 2010 algorithms| > [!NOTE] > 如果将属性设置为0、1或2以外的值, 将导致未定义的行为。Setting the property to a value other than 0, 1, or 2 will result in undefined behavior. 下表总结了通过将属性设置为1来影响哪些函数。The following table summarizes which functions are affected by setting the property to 1. "不受影响的函数" 列中列出的函数将始终使用最新的准确性算法, 或在 Excel 2010 中未进行更改。The functions that are listed in the "Functions not affected" column will always use the latest accuracy algorithms or were not changed in Excel 2010. 对于名称中包含句点 (.) 的函数名, 若要确定在 VBA 中作为对象的方法实现的相应函数的名称, 请用下划线字符 (_) 替换句点。For function names that include a period (.) in their names, to determine the name of the corresponding function implemented in VBA as a method of the object, substitute the underscore character ( _ ) for the period. 例如, 对应于 BETA 的 VBA 方法。DIST 函数是方法。For example, the VBA method that corresponds to the BETA.DIST function is the MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Activate() cil managed

summary.span: 激活工作簿的第一个关联窗口。

span.span: Activates the first window associated with the workbook.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这不会运行可能附加到工作簿的任何 Auto_Activate 或 Auto_Deactivate 宏 (使用方法运行这些宏)。This does not run any Auto_Activate or Auto_Deactivate macros that might be attached to the workbook (use the method to run those macros).

summary.span: 在激活工作簿时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the workbook is activated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在显示同一工作簿的两个窗口之间切换时, 将发生事件 , 但不会发生工作簿事件。When you switch between two windows showing the same workbook, the event occurs, but the event for the workbook does not occur. 此事件不会在创建新窗口时发生。This event does not occur when you create a new window. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示事件的处理程序。The following code example demonstrates a handler for the event. 激活工作簿时, `Sheet1`事件处理程序会显示工作表。The event handler displays worksheet `Sheet1` when the workbook is activated. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果工作簿出现在多个窗口中, 则该属性在不同的窗口中可能会有所不同。If the workbook appears in more than one window, this property may be different in different windows. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来显示活动工作表的名称。The following code example uses the property to display the name of the active worksheet. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定工作簿对象, 则此属性将返回活动工作簿中的活动切片器。If you do not specify a Workbook object, this property returns the active slicer in the active workbook. > [!NOTE] > 此属性显示在面向的[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]Excel 2007 项目中的 IntelliSense 中。This property appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是, 不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此属性。However, this property cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

summary.span: 在 Microsoft Office Excel 保存工作簿的数据或将数据从工作簿导出到 XML 数据文件后发生。

span.span: Occurs after Microsoft Office Excel saves or exports data from the workbook to an XML data file.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从工作簿导出 XML 数据。The following code example demonstrates how to export XML data from a workbook. 此示例将中的 XML 数据导入到当前工作簿中的。 The example imports the XML data from a into a in the current workbook. 然后, 该示例调用方法, 将中的数据导出到 XML 文件中。The example then calls the method to export the data from the into an XML file. 调用方法时 , 事件处理程序会报告 xml 正在导出, 事件处理程序会报告 xml 是否已成功导出。 When the method is called, the event handler reports that the XML is being exported, and the event handler reports whether the XML was successfully exported. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWorkBook#203](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWorkBook/CS/ThisWorkbook.cs#203)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWorkBook#203](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWorkBook/VB/ThisWorkbook.vb#203)]

summary.span: 在刷新现有 XML 数据连接后或将新 XML 数据导入工作簿后发生。

span.span: Occurs after an existing XML data connection is refreshed or after new XML data is imported into the workbook.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 XML 数据导入工作簿。The following code example demonstrates how to import XML data into a workbook. 该示例创建一个客户名称, 并基于的 XML 架构将添加到当前工作簿的集合中。The example creates a of customer names and adds an based on the XML schema for the to the collection of the current workbook. 然后, 该示例调用方法将数据导入工作表`Sheet1`。The example then calls the method to import the data into worksheet `Sheet1`. 调用方法时 , 事件处理程序会提示用户继续或取消导入 xml, 事件处理程序会报告 xml 是否已成功导入。 When the method is called, the event handler prompts the user to either proceed with or cancel importing the XML, and the event handler reports whether the XML was successfully imported. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWorkBook#204](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWorkBook/CS/ThisWorkbook.cs#204)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWorkBook#204](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWorkBook/VB/ThisWorkbook.vb#204)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示事件的处理程序。The following code example demonstrates a handler for the event. 如果自上次保存工作簿后对其进行了更改, 则该事件处理程序会提示用户保存更改, 而不保存更改或取消关闭操作。The event handler prompts the user to either save changes, not save changes, or cancel the close operation if changes have been made to the workbook since it was last saved. 如果用户未保存更改, 则将工作簿的属性设置为`true` , 以便 Microsoft Office Excel 在关闭操作继续时不会提示用户保存工作簿。If the user does not save changes, then the property of the workbook is set to `true` so that Microsoft Office Excel does not prompt the user to save the workbook when the close operation continues. 如果用户取消了关闭操作, 则`Cancel` 事件处理程序的参数将设置为`true` , 以便 Microsoft Office Excel 不会关闭工作簿。If the user cancels the close operation, then the `Cancel` parameter of the event handler is set to `true` so that Microsoft Office Excel does not close the workbook. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. summary.span: 获取一个 Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties 集合，该集合表示工作簿的所有内置文档属性。

value.span: 一个DocumentProperties集合, 表示工作簿的所有内置文档属性。

span.span: A Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties collection that represents all the built-in document properties for the workbook.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回内置文档属性的整个集合。This property returns the entire collection of built-in document properties. 通过指定属性的名称或集合索引 (作为数字), `Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties`使用属性返回集合中的单个成员(一个对象)。`Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties.Item(System.Object)`Use the `Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties.Item(System.Object)` property to return a single member of the collection (a `Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties` object) by specifying either the name of the property or the collection index (as a number). 可以按索引值或按名称引用文档属性。You can refer to document properties either by index value or by name. 以下列表显示了可用的内置文档属性名称:The following list shows the available built-in document property names: - TitleTitle - SubjectSubject - 作者Author - 关键字Keywords - 注释Comments - 模板Template - 上次作者Last Author - 修订号Revision Number - Application NameApplication Name - 上次打印日期Last Print Date - 创建日期Creation Date - 上次保存时间Last Save Time - 编辑时间总计Total Editing Time - 页数Number of Pages - 字数Number of Words - 字符数Number of Characters - 安全性Security - 类别Category - 格式Format - ManagerManager - 公司Company - 字节数Number of Bytes - 行数Number of Lines - 段落数Number of Paragraphs - 幻灯片数Number of Slides - 便笺数Number of Notes - 隐藏的幻灯片数Number of Hidden Slides - 多媒体剪辑数Number of Multimedia Clips - 超链接基础Hyperlink Base - 字符数 (包含空格)Number of Characters (with spaces) 容器应用程序不需要定义每个内置文档属性的值。Container applications are not required to define values for every built-in document property. 如果 Microsoft Office Excel 未定义某个内置文档属性的值, 则读取`Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties.Value`该文档属性的属性会引发异常。If Microsoft Office Excel does not define a value for one of the built-in document properties, reading the `Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties.Value` property for that document property throws an exception. 使用属性返回自定义文档属性的集合。Use the property to return the collection of custom document properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性在工作表`Sheet1`的 A 列中显示当前工作簿的所有内置文档属性。The following code example uses the property to display all of the built-in document properties of the current workbook in column A of worksheet `Sheet1`. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果以只读模式打开了某个文件, 则不具有对该文件的独占访问权限。If you have a file open in read-only mode, you do not have exclusive access to the file. 如果将文件从只读更改为读/写, Microsoft Office Excel 必须加载文件的新副本, 以确保在文件以只读方式打开时不进行任何更改。If you change a file from read-only to read/write, Microsoft Office Excel must load a new copy of the file to ensure that no changes were made while you had the file open as read-only. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 有关可选参数的信息, 请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions). ## Examples 如果属性为`true` 且属性为`false`, 则下面的代码示例将显示一条消息, 然后提示用户通过调用方法将文件访问设置为只读。The following code example displays a message if the property is `true` and the property is `false`, and then prompts the user to set the file access to read-only by calling the method. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可与以下参数一起使用。The property can be used with the following parameter. |参数Parameter|说明Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Index`|工作簿调色板中颜色的索引号 (从1到 56)。The index number of a color in the workbook color palette (from 1 to 56). 如果未指定此参数, 此属性将返回一个数组, 其中包含调色板中所有56的颜色。If this argument is not specified, this property returns an array that contains all 56 of the colors in the palette.| 如果尝试在不指定任何参数的情况下使用, 将获取一个对象, 该对象是 Visual Studio 基础结构中的 Office 开发工具的一部分, 不应在代码中直接使用。If you attempt to use without specifying any parameters, will get a object that is part of the Office development tools in Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 工作簿调色板包含56个条目, 每个条目由一个 RGB 值表示。The workbook palette has 56 entries, each represented by an RGB value. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 有关可选参数的信息, 请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性将工作簿的调色板中的第一种颜色设置为蓝色, 然后以编程方式显示 "Microsoft Office Excel**调色板**" 对话框以验证是否进行了此更改。The following code example uses the property to set the first color in the workbook's color palette to blue, and then programmatically displays the Microsoft Office Excel **Color Palette** dialog to verify that this change was made. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果工作簿嵌入到另一个应用程序中并通过双击工作簿由用户激活, 则使用带有工作簿对象的属性将返回在另一个应用程序中可用的 Excel 命令栏集。When a workbook is embedded in another application and activated by the user by double-clicking the workbook, using the property with a Workbook object returns the set of Excel command bars available within the other application. 在所有其他时间, 将此属性与工作簿对象结合`null`使用将返回。At all other times, using this property with a Workbook object returns `null`. 不能通过编程方式来返回附加到工作簿的命令栏集。There is no programmatic way to return the set of command bars attached to a workbook. 命令栏与应用程序相关联, 而不是与工作簿相关联。Command bars are associated with the application and not the workbook. 此属性存在于工作簿中, 因此在 Excel 不是应用程序时可以访问 Excel 应用程序命令栏。This property exists on the workbook so you can access Excel application command bars when Excel is not the application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性删除所有不可见的自定义命令栏。The following code example uses the property to delete all custom command bars that are not visible. 此示例假设当前工作簿嵌入到另一个应用程序中。This example assumes that the current workbook is embedded in another application. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. The CSV file should contain comma-separated data. 运行此示例时, Excel 将启动 "**文本导入向导**";按照此向导中的步骤创建到 CSV 文件的数据连接。When you run this example, Excel starts the **Text Import Wizard**; follow the steps in this wizard to create the data connection to the CSV file. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写此方法以返回`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility`接口的实现。Override this method to return an implementation of the `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` interface. 如果项目中有多个功能区, 则可以指定要在运行时显示的功能区。If you have multiple Ribbons in your project, you can specify which Ribbons to display at run time. 您不必重写此方法即可返回通过使用 "**功能区 (可视化设计器)** " 项模板添加到项目中的功能区。You do not have to override this method to return Ribbons that you add to the project by using the **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item template. 默认情况下, 此方法返回一个对象, 该对象表示项目中的所有 "**功能区 (可视化设计器)** " 项。By default, this method returns a object that represents all **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** items in the project. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview). 您必须重写或方法才能在您的项目中返回通过使用 "**功能区 (XML)** " 项模板添加的功能区。You must override the or method to return Ribbons in your project that you add by using the **Ribbon (XML)** item template. 有关如何重写方法的详细信息, 请参阅[功能区 XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml)。For more information about how to override the method, see [Ribbon XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 Excel 失败, 系统将失败, 或者如果系统未正确关闭 (不允许 Excel 保存已更改的文件), 则将打开备份的文件, 并且用户有机会保存更改 (否则会丢失)。If Excel fails, the system fails, or if the system is improperly shut down (not allowing Excel to save the changed files), the backed up files are opened and the user has an opportunity to save changes that otherwise would have been lost. 当用户重新启动 Excel 时, "文档恢复" 窗口将打开, 并为用户提供一个用于恢复正在处理的文件的选项。When the user restarts Excel, a document recovery window opens, giving the user an option to recover the files they were working on.

summary.span: 获取内置图标集的集合，这些图标集可用于对工作簿中的范围应用条件格式规则。

span.span: Gets the collection of built-in icon sets that can be used to apply a conditional formatting rule to a range in the workbook.

value.span: 一个IconSets集合, 其中包含内置图标集对象, 这些对象可用于向范围应用条件格式设置规则。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用图标集将范围数据分为三到五个类别, 并以阈值分隔。You can use an icon set to classify range data into three to five categories separated by threshold values. 每个图标表示一系列值。Each icon represents a range of values. 例如, 在`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlIconSet.xl3Arrows`图标集中, 红色向上箭头表示较高的值, 黄色侧向箭头表示中间值, 绿色向下箭头表示较小的值。For example, in the `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlIconSet.xl3Arrows` icon set, the red up arrow represents higher values, the yellow sideways arrow represents middle values, and the green down arrow represents lower values. 若要基于图标集应用条件`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSetCondition`格式规则, 请`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.FormatConditions.AddIconSetCondition`使用范围的属性的方法或命名范围的属性创建一个新的。To apply a conditional formatting rule based on an icon set, create a new `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSetCondition` by using the `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.FormatConditions.AddIconSetCondition` method of the property of a range, or the property of a named range. 然后, 将`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSetCondition.IconSet`属性设置`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSet`为从属性中检索的对象。Then, set the `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSetCondition.IconSet` property to an `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSet` object that you retrieve from the property. 若要指定`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSet`要检索的对象, 请将其中一个`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlIconSet`枚举值作为索引传递到属性。To specify the `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSet` object that you want to retrieve, pass in one of the `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlIconSet` enumeration values as an index to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例`Sheet1`使用1到6之间的值填充范围。The following code example populates a range on `Sheet1` with values from 1 to 6. 然后, 该示例使用`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlIconSet.xl3Arrows`图标集向 A1: A6 范围中添加一个图标集条件。The example then adds an icon set condition to the range A1:A6 with the `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlIconSet.xl3Arrows` icon set. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为`true`时, 工作簿具有以下特征:When you set this property to `true`, the workbook has the following characteristics: - 如果工作簿处于打开状态, 则不会提示您保存该工作簿。You are not prompted to save the workbook if changes are made while the workbook is open. - 工作簿窗口不可见。The workbook window is not visible. - 工作簿中的所有宏都不显示在**宏**对话框中 (通过指向 "**工具**" 菜单上的 "**宏**", 然后单击 "**宏**" 来显示)。Any macros in the workbook are not visible in the **Macro** dialog box (displayed by pointing to **Macro** on the **Tools** menu and clicking **Macros**). - 即使不显示工作簿中的宏, 仍可以从 "**宏**" 对话框运行。Macros in the workbook can still be run from the **Macro** dialog box even though they are not visible. 此外, 宏名称不需要用工作簿名称限定。In addition, macro names do not need to be qualified with the workbook name. - 打开工作簿时按住 SHIFT 键不起作用。Holding down the SHIFT key when you open the workbook has no effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的中的名称是链接文档、版本或 DDE 或 OLE 服务器的名称。The names in the returned are the names of the linked documents, editions, or DDE or OLE servers. 数组的格式是适用于所有类型但发布服务器和订阅服务器的一维数组。The format of the array is a one-dimensional array for all types but publisher and subscriber. 返回的字符串包含链接源的名称, 采用链接类型的适当表示法。The returned strings contain the name of the link source, in the appropriate notation for the link type. 例如, DDE 链接使用 "服务器|文档!Item "语法。For example, DDE links use the "Server|Document!Item" syntax. 对于发布服务器和订阅服务器链接, 返回的数组为二维。For publisher and subscriber links, the returned array is two-dimensional. 数组的第一列包含版本的名称, 第二列包含以文本形式进行的版本引用。The first column of the array contains the names of the edition, and the second column contains the references of the editions as text. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 有关可选参数的信息, 请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将外部 Excel 链接添加到当前工作簿, 并使用方法获取工作簿中所有 Excel 链接的名称的数组。The following code example adds an external Excel link to the current workbook and gets an array of the names of all Excel links in the workbook by using the method. 然后, 该示例使用方法以只读方式打开每个链接的工作簿。The example then uses the method to open each linked workbook as read-only. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用结合大写字母和小写字母、数字和符号的强密码。Use strong passwords that combine uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols. 弱密码不会混合使用这些元素。Weak passwords do not mix these elements. 强密码:Y6dh!et5.Strong password: Y6dh!et5. 弱密码:House27.Weak password: House27. 使用可以记住的强密码, 这样就无需将其记下。Use a strong password that you can remember so that you do not have to write it down. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查属性的值, 以确定工作簿是否受密码保护。The following code example checks the value of the property to determine whether the workbook is password protected. 如果工作簿不受密码保护, 则该示例将属性设置为从用户输入获得的密码, 然后调用方法来设置加密算法, 设置密钥长度, 设置加密提供程序的名称,和启用文件属性加密。If the workbook is not password protected, then the example sets the property to a password obtained from user input, and then calls the method to set the encryption algorithm, set the key length, set the name of the encryption provider, and enable file property encryption. 然后, 该示例在工作表 中`Sheet1`显示、、和属性的值。The example then displays the values of the , , , and properties in worksheet `Sheet1`. 此示例假定方法`GetPasswordFromUserInput`是在其他地方定义的。This example assumes that the method `GetPasswordFromUserInput` is defined elsewhere. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用结合大写字母和小写字母、数字和符号的强密码。Use strong passwords that combine uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols. 弱密码不会混合使用这些元素。Weak passwords do not mix these elements. 例如, "Y6dh! et5" 是一个强密码, 而 "House27" 是弱密码。For example, "Y6dh!et5" is a strong password, but "House27" is a weak password. 使用可以记住的强密码, 这样就无需将其记下。Use a strong password that you can remember so that you do not have to write it down. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 有关可选参数的信息, 请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来保护工作簿和工作簿窗口的结构, 但不指定密码保护。The following code example uses the method to protect the structure of the workbook and workbook windows, but without specifying password protection. 然后, 该示例检查和属性的值以验证是否设置了此保护。The example then checks the values of the and properties to verify that this protection is set. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. summary.span: 由 [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] 调用，以便可在保存缓存数据后，重新对工作簿应用密码保护。

span.span: Called by the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] so that you can reapply password protection to the workbook after the cached data has been saved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果工作簿是使用密码保护的, 则在 Excel 文档级项目中重写此方法, 它包含在运行时可能更改的缓存数据。Override this method in a document-level project for Excel if your workbook is protected by using a password, and it contains cached data that might be changed at run time. 在此方法的实现中, 使用方法来保护工作簿。In your implementation of this method, use the method to protect the workbook. 默认情况下, 保存工作簿时, 对受密码保护的工作簿中的缓存数据所做的更改将不会保留。By default, changes to cached data in a password-protected workbook are not persisted when the workbook is saved. 若要保存对缓存数据所做的更改, 必须在项目中重写以下方法:To save changes to the cached data, you must override the following methods in your project: - 。. 保存工作簿时, 将[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用此方法。When the workbook is saved, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls this method. 将代码添加到暂时取消对工作簿的工作的此方法中。Add code to this method that temporarily unprotects the workbook. 这样, 就可以保存对缓存数据所做的更改。This enables changes to the cached data to be saved. - 。. 保存工作簿后, 将[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用此方法。After the workbook is saved, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls this method. 将代码添加到此方法, 以便对工作簿重新应用保护。Add code to this method that reapplies protection to the workbook. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：在受密码保护的文档](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-cache-data-in-a-password-protected-document)中缓存数据。For more information, see [How to: Cache Data in a Password-Protected Document](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-cache-data-in-a-password-protected-document). 即使因某些与密码保护无关的错误而导致无法保存缓存的数据, 也会调用方法。[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]The [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls the method even if the cached data could not be saved because of some error that is unrelated to the password protection. 例如, 如果你实现接口以自定义缓存数据在文档中的存储方式, 则即使你的实现引发了阻止保存缓存数据的异常, 也会调用方法。For example, if you implement the interface to customize how cached data is stored in the document, the method is called even if your implementation throws an exception that prevents the cached data from being saved. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法, 以重新应用通过重写方法删除的保护。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to reapply protection that was removed by overriding the method. 若要使用此代码, 请在 Excel `ThisWorkbook`文档级项目的类中运行它。To use this code, run it from the `ThisWorkbook` class in a document-level project for Excel. 此代码假定密码存储在名为`securelyStoredPassword`的字段中。The code assumes that the password is stored in a field named `securelyStoredPassword`. by creating your own implementation of the `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` interface or by adding a **Ribbon (XML)** item to your project. 如果通过将 "**功能区 (可视化设计器)** " 项添加到项目自定义功能区, 则 Visual 请参阅[功能区概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview)和[功能区设计器](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-designer)。For more information, see [Ribbon Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview) and [Ribbon Designer](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-designer). 如果重写此方法, 请检查`serviceGuid`参数的值以确定`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility`是否正在请求接口, 然后返回实现该接口的对象。If you override this method, check the value of the `serviceGuid` parameter to determine whether the `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` interface is being requested, and then return an object that implements the interface. 打开工作簿后, [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用, 并将返回值发送到 Microsoft Office Excel。When your workbook is opened, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls , and it sends the return value to Microsoft Office Excel. 有关`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility`接口的详细信息, 请参阅 Microsoft Office 文档中的[microsoft.office.core.iribbonextensibility 对象](HV10096517)。For more information about the `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` interface, see [IRibbonExtensibility Object](HV10096517) in the Microsoft Office documentation. 您也可以重写方法, 而不是重写方法。You can alternatively override the method instead of overriding the method. 有关更多信息，请参见 [Ribbon XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml)。For more information, see [Ribbon XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml). > [!NOTE] > `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility`是 Microsoft Office 提供的多个接口 (也称为*扩展性接口*) 之一。`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` is one of several interfaces (also named *extensibility interfaces*) that are provided by Microsoft Office. 但是, 这是可在 Excel 文档级自定义项中实现的唯一接口。However, this is the only interface that you can implement in a document-level customization for Excel. 可以在应用程序级外接程序中实现其他扩展性接口。有关详细信息，请参阅 [Customizing UI Features By Using Extensibility Interfaces](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces)。You can implement other extensibility interfaces in application-level add-ins. For more information, see [Customizing UI Features By Using Extensibility Interfaces](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果从未保存过工作簿, 则其属性返回空字符串 ("")。If a workbook has never been saved, its property returns an empty string (""). 如果要在不保存修改`true`的工作簿的情况下关闭修改后的工作簿, 则可以将此属性设置为。You can set this property to `true` if you want to close a modified workbook without either saving it or being prompted to save it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个事件的处理程序, 该处理程序提示用户保存更改, 而不保存更改, 或者如果自上次保存后对工作簿进行了更改, 则取消关闭操作。The following code example demonstrates a handler for the event that prompts the user to either save changes, not save changes, or cancel the close operation if changes have been made to the workbook since it was last saved. 如果用户未保存更改, 则将工作簿的属性设置为`true` , 以便 Microsoft Office Excel 在关闭操作继续时不会提示用户保存工作簿。If the user does not save changes, then the property of the workbook is set to `true` so that Microsoft Office Excel does not prompt the user to save the workbook when the close operation continues. 如果用户取消了关闭操作, 则`Cancel` 事件处理程序的参数将设置为`true` , 以便 Microsoft Office Excel 不会关闭工作簿。If the user cancels the close operation, then the `Cancel` parameter of the event handler is set to `true` so that Microsoft Office Excel does not close the workbook. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回工作簿中的项的集合, 您可以将这些项发布到 Excel Services。This property returns a collection of the items in the workbook that you can publish to Excel Services. 只有此集合中的对象才会显示在服务器上。Only objects in this collection will be shown on the server. 默认情况下, 将显示整个工作簿 (包括所有工作表)。By default, the entire workbook (including all worksheets) is shown. 每个工作簿只能存在一个对象。Only one object can exist per workbook. 此集合不能按名称编制索引, 因为无法保证在服务器上标记为可查看的对象的名称是唯一的。This collection cannot be indexed by name, because there is no guarantee that the names of objects that are marked as viewable on the server are unique. 在 Excel 用户界面的 " **Excel Services 选项**" 对话框中, 您可以查看在服务器上标记为 "可查看" 的对象集合。In the Excel user interface, you can view the collection of objects that are marked as viewable on the server in the **Excel Services Options** dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `PasswordEncryptionProvider`、和参数`PasswordEncryptionKeyLength`不是相互独立的。 `PasswordEncryptionAlgorithm`The `PasswordEncryptionProvider`, `PasswordEncryptionAlgorithm`, and `PasswordEncryptionKeyLength` parameters are not independent of each other. 选定的加密提供程序限制了可以选择的算法集和密钥长度。A selected encryption provider limits the set of algorithms and key length that can be chosen. `PasswordEncryptionKeyLength`对于参数, 密钥长度范围没有内在限制。For the `PasswordEncryptionKeyLength` parameter there is no inherent limit on the range of the key length. 范围由加密服务提供程序确定, 该提供程序还确定加密算法。The range is determined by the Cryptographic Service Provider which also determines the cryptographic algorithm. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 有关可选参数的信息, 请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions). ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查属性的值, 以确定工作簿是否受密码保护。The following code example checks the value of the property to determine whether the workbook is password protected. 如果工作簿不受密码保护, 则该示例将属性设置为从用户输入获得的密码, 然后调用方法来设置加密算法, 设置密钥长度, 设置加密提供程序的名称,和启用文件属性加密。If the workbook is not password protected, then the example sets the property to a password obtained from user input, and then calls the method to set the encryption algorithm, set the key length, set the name of the encryption provider, and enable file property encryption. 然后, 该示例在工作表 中`Sheet1`显示、、和属性的值。The example then displays the values of the , , , and properties in worksheet `Sheet1`. 此示例假定方法`GetPasswordFromUserInput`是在其他地方定义的。This example assumes that the method `GetPasswordFromUserInput` is defined elsewhere. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. summary.span: 在双击任意工作表之后，默认的双击操作之前发生。

span.span: Occurs when any worksheet is double-clicked, before the default double-click action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件不会在图表工作表上发生。This event does not occur on chart sheets. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示事件的处理程序。The following code example demonstrates a handler for the event. 事件处理程序通知用户不允许对工作表进行双击, 然后将`Cancel` 事件处理程序的参数设置为`true` , 以便 Microsoft Office Excel 取消双击操作。The event handler informs the user that double-clicking is not allowed for the worksheet, and then sets the `Cancel` parameter of the event handler to `true` so that Microsoft Office Excel cancels the double-click action. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. summary.span: 在对数据透视表内的单元格或单元格范围进行编辑或重新计算（针对包含公式的单元格）后发生。

span.span: Occurs after a cell or range of cells inside a PivotTable are edited or recalculated (for cells that contain formulas).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在编辑或重新计算单元格以外的任何情况下, 事件不会发生。The event does not occur under any conditions other than editing or recalculating cells. 例如, 如果对数据透视表进行刷新、排序、筛选或深化, 则不会发生这种情况, 即使这些操作移动单元格并且可能从 OLAP 数据源检索新值也是如此。For example, it will not occur when the PivotTable is refreshed, sorted, filtered, or drilled down on, even though those operations move cells and potentially retrieve new values from the OLAP data source. > [!NOTE] > 此事件显示在面向的[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]Excel 2007 项目中的 IntelliSense 中。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是, 在 Excel 2007 项目中不能使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

exception.span: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

span.span: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.

summary.span: 在将更改应用于数据透视表之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before changes are applied to a PivotTable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件在 Excel 执行 UPDATE CUBE 语句之前立即发生, 以将所有更改应用于数据透视表的 OLAP 数据源, 并在用户选择在用户界面中应用更改之后立即发生。The event occurs immediately before Excel executes an UPDATE CUBE statement to apply all changes to the PivotTable's OLAP data source, and immediately after the user has chosen to apply changes in the user interface. > [!NOTE] > 此事件显示在面向的[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]Excel 2007 项目中的 IntelliSense 中。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是, 在 Excel 2007 项目中不能使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

exception.span: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

span.span: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.

summary.span: 在针对 OLAP 数据源提交数据透视表的更改之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before changes are committed against the OLAP data source for a PivotTable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件在 Excel 针对数据透视表的 OLAP 数据源执行 COMMIT TRANSACTION 之前发生, 并在用户选择保存整个数据透视表的更改之后立即发生。The event occurs immediately before Excel executes a COMMIT TRANSACTION against the PivotTable's OLAP data source, and immediately after the user has chosen to save changes for the whole PivotTable. > [!NOTE] > 此事件显示在面向的[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]Excel 2007 项目中的 IntelliSense 中。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是, 在 Excel 2007 项目中不能使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

exception.span: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

span.span: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.

summary.span: 在放弃对数据透视表的更改之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before changes to a PivotTable are discarded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果事务仍处于活动状态, 则此事件会在 Excel 对 OLAP 数据源执行 ROLLBACK TRANSACTION 语句之前立即发生, 如果事务仍处于活动状态, 则在用户选择放弃更改后放弃数据透视表中的所有编辑值。This event occurs immediately before Excel executes a ROLLBACK TRANSACTION statement against the OLAP data source, if a transaction is still active, and then discards all edited values in the PivotTable, after the user has chosen to discard changes. > [!NOTE] > 此事件显示在面向的[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]Excel 2007 项目中的 IntelliSense 中。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是, 在 Excel 2007 项目中不能使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

exception.span: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

span.span: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.

summary.span: 在对数据透视表进行更改后发生。

span.span: Occurs after changes to a PivotTable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在对数据透视表进行大多数更改期间发生, 以便您可以编写代码来响应用户操作, 如清除、分组或刷新数据透视表中的项。The occurs during most changes to a PivotTable, so that you can write code to respond to user actions, such as clearing, grouping, or refreshing items in the PivotTable. > [!NOTE] > 此事件显示在面向的[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]Excel 2007 项目中的 IntelliSense 中。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是, 在 Excel 2007 项目中不能使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

summary.span: 在工作簿宿主项关闭时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the workbook host item shuts down.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是卸载 类时要在类中调用的最后一个事件。This is the last event to be called in the class as the class unloads. 此事件用于任何其他清理。Use this event for any additional clean up. 在文档级自定义项中, 在工作簿宿主项关闭时将卸载程序集的应用程序域。In a document-level customization, the application domain for the assembly unloads when the workbook host item shuts down. 在应用程序级外接程序中, 工作簿宿主项关闭时不会卸载应用程序域。In an application-level add-in, the application domain does not unload when the workbook host item shuts down. 此外, 基础工作簿对象不再可用。Also, the underlying workbook object is no more available. 若要在关闭工作簿后对其进行访问, 请改用。To access the workbook before it shuts down use instead. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示事件的处理程序。The following code example demonstrates a handler for the event. 此事件处理程序在类卸载时显示一条消息。The event handler displays a message when the class unloads. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要对 Excel 工作簿进行数字签名并验证其中的其他签名, 需要 Microsoft CryptoAPI 和唯一的数字签名证书。To digitally sign Excel workbooks and verify other signatures in them, you need the Microsoft CryptoAPI and a unique digital signature certificate. CryptoAPI 与 Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.01 或更高版本一起安装。The CryptoAPI is installed with Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.01 or later. 可以从证书颁发机构获取数字签名证书。You can obtain a digital signature certificate from a certification authority. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取附加到当前工作簿的签名数, 并向用户显示相应的消息。The following code example gets the number of signatures that are attached to the current workbook and displays an appropriate message to the user. 此示例适用于文档级自定义项。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果工作簿是使用密码保护的, 则在 Excel 文档级项目中重写此方法, 它包含在运行时可能更改的缓存数据。Override this method in a document-level project for Excel if your workbook is protected by using a password, and it contains cached data that might be changed at run time. 在此方法的实现中, 使用方法暂时取消保护工作簿。In your implementation of this method, use the method to temporarily unprotect the workbook. 默认情况下, 保存工作簿时, 对受密码保护的工作簿中的缓存数据所做的更改将不会保留。By default, changes to cached data in a password-protected workbook are not persisted when the workbook is saved. 若要保存对缓存数据所做的更改, 必须在项目中重写以下方法:To save changes to the cached data, you must override the following methods in your project: - 。. 保存工作簿时, 将[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用此方法。When the workbook is saved, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls this method. 将代码添加到暂时取消对工作簿的工作的此方法中。Add code to this method that temporarily unprotects the workbook. 这样, 就可以保存对缓存数据所做的更改。This enables changes to the cached data to be saved. - 。. 保存工作簿后, 将[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用此方法。After the workbook is saved, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls this method. 将代码添加到此方法, 以便对工作簿重新应用保护。Add code to this method that reapplies protection to the workbook. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：在受密码保护的文档](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-cache-data-in-a-password-protected-document)中缓存数据。For more information, see [How to: Cache Data in a Password-Protected Document](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-cache-data-in-a-password-protected-document). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法以暂时取消对工作簿的保护, 以便保存对缓存数据所做的更改。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to temporarily unprotect the workbook so that changes to the cached data can be saved. 该示例首先保存当前的和值, 以便在稍后的方法中可以重新应用相同的保护类型。The example first saves the current and values, so that the same type of protection can be reapplied later in the method. 若要使用此代码, 请在 Excel `ThisWorkbook`文档级项目的类中运行它。To use this code, run it from the `ThisWorkbook` class in a document-level project for Excel. 此代码假定密码存储在名为`securelyStoredPassword`的字段中。The code assumes that the password is stored in a field named `securelyStoredPassword`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用结合大写字母和小写字母、数字和符号的强密码。Use strong passwords that combine uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols. 弱密码不会混合使用这些元素。Weak passwords do not mix these elements. 强密码:Y6dh!et5.Strong password: Y6dh!et5. 弱密码:House27.Weak password: House27. 使用可以记住的强密码, 这样就无需将其记下。Use a strong password that you can remember so that you do not have to write it down. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 有关可选参数的信息, 请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions).

summary.span: 如果磁盘版本比内存中加载的工作簿副本更新，则从保存的工作簿磁盘版本更新只读工作簿。

span.span: Updates a read-only workbook from the saved disk version of the workbook if the disk version is more recent than the copy of the workbook that is loaded in memory.

summary.span: 如果自加载工作簿以来还未更改过磁盘副本，则不重新加载工作簿的内存副本。

span.span: If the disk copy has not changed since the workbook was loaded, the in-memory copy of the workbook is not reloaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户 A 以只读方式打开工作簿, 并且用户 B 以读/写方式打开时, 此方法非常有用。如果用户 B 在用户 A 仍打开工作簿的情况下将较新版本的工作簿保存到磁盘, 则用户 A 将无法在不关闭和重新打开工作簿的情况下获取更新后的副本, 因而将失去视图设置。This method is useful when a workbook is opened as read-only by user A and opened as read/write by user B. If user B saves a newer version of the workbook to disk while user A still has the workbook open, user A cannot get the updated copy without closing and reopening the workbook and losing view settings. 方法更新磁盘文件中工作簿的内存中副本。The method updates the in-memory copy of the workbook from the disk file.
